name: Solitaire (itch) (modelivesky)
description:
Solitaire.Sky Card Game by modelivesky.com GAME FEATURES

- Standard solitaire game.

- Cartoon graphics.

-  Four difficulty levels: draw 1 to 4 cards.

-  Three music backgrounds.

- Relaxing and aesthetic.

HOW TO PLAY SOLITAIRE If you like it, please support me :-)
